characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Warbeasts] [Pain Response]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Warbeasts models gain Pain Response. (While damaged, a model with Pain Response can charge and make power attacks without being forced.)

characterabilities.name: Outrage
characterabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, after the attack is resoved this model gains +2 ARM, +2 to its melee attack damage rolls, and Pathfinder for one round.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

arcana.name: Wrath
arcana.description:
The warlock can play this card when an enemy model damages a model in the warlock's battlegroup with an attack.

The Warlock gains 1 fury point and the Fury Stats of models in the warlock's battlegroup currently in its Control range are increased by 1. Wrath lasts for one round, when wrath express increase the warlock's Control range by 2” until the end of your next maintenance phase.

ability.name: Critical Pitch
ability.description: On a critical hit against a model with an equal or smaller base, the model hit can be thrown d6" directly away from this model. The model thrown does not deviate. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the POW of this weapon.

spells.name: Abuse
spells.description: Target friendly Faction living cohort gains +2 SPD and +2 to its melee attack damage rolls for one turn but suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Discord
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains Wailing. (While within 5” of a model with wailing, enemy models cannot cast or channel spells.)

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Tantrum
spells.description: If one or more models in the spellcaster's battlegroup were damaged by enemy attacks while in the spellcaster's command range during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase one model in the spellcaster's battleroup in it's Control range can advance 2” and make one basic melee attack.

characterabilities.name: Future Sight
characterabilities.description: This model can boost attack accuracy and damage rolls after rolling.

characterabilities.name: Hat Trick
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model is boxed while in this model's Control range, you can replace the boxed model with a Phantasm model with the same or smaller base size. The replaced model is removed from play. You can have only one Phantasm model of each base size in play at any time.

characterabilities.name: Wraith Walker
characterabilities.description: At the end of your Control Phase, this model can become incorporeal for one round unless it was incorporeal during the last round.

arcana.name: All Fall Down
arcana.description:
The warlock can play this card when a friendly Faction model is disabled by an enemy attack while in the warlock's Control range.

When an enemy model destroys or removes a friendly Faction model from play with an attack during its activation, at the end of its activation the enemy model becomes knocked down. All Fall Down lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Struggle (★Attack)
execution.description: Deal 1 damage point to each enemy model engaged, or engaging this model, and this model suffers 1 damage point for each damage it dealt.

ability.name: Reload [2]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 2 focus, fury, or essence to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Sleepwalker
ability.description: This attack causes no damage. Instead, a living warrior model hit by this attack becomes stationary for one round. On a critical hit on a non-Leader living enemy warrior model, before it becomes stationary you can take Control of the model hit. You can immediately make a full advance with the enemy model followed by a basic attack, then the model reverts to your opponent's Control and becomes stationary for one round. The enemy model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

spells.name: Abyssal Gate
spells.description: When Abyssal Gate damages an enemy non-Leader model, after the attack is resolved you can place the enemy model anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. A model can be placed by Abyssal Gate only once per turn.

spells.name: Artifice of Deviation
spells.description: Place a 5' cloud effect template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, friendly Faction models gain cover. Enemy models treat the template as rough terrain.

spells.name: Enfeeble
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 to Accuracy and Damage rolls.

spells.name: Manifest Destiny
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain an additional die on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Discard the lowest die of each roll. Manifest Destiny lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Mirage
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Apparition. (During your Control Phase, place models with Apparition anywhere completely within 2" of their current locations.).

characterabilities.name: Annoyance
characterabilities.description: Living enemy models within 1" of this model suffer -1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Pop! Goes the Weasel
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed, all models within 5” are pushed 3” directly away from this model, and suffer a POW 10 Blast Damage Roll.

characterabilities.name: Annoyance
characterabilities.description: Living enemy models within 1" of this model suffer -1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Dark Shroud
characterabilities.description: While in this model's melee range, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.

characterabilities.name: Annoyance
characterabilities.description: Living enemy models within 1" of this model suffer -1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Pulse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed by an enemy attack, enemy upkeep spells on models within 8” of it expire.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Annoyance
characterabilities.description: Living enemy models within 1" of this model suffer -1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Channeler [Friend Faction Warlock]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in a Friendly Leader's Control Range, the Friendly Leader model can channel spells through it.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Annoyance
characterabilities.description: Living enemy models within 1" of this model suffer -1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Mark Target
characterabilities.description: Other friendly Faction models gain +2 to ranged attack rolls against enemy models within 5" of this model and in its LOS.

characterabilities.name: Divinity
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down and never suffers Blind. Models do not gain back strike bonuses against this model.

characterabilities.name: Godlike Power
characterabilities.description: During its activation, this model can cast any non-animus spell that was cast by an enemy warlock or warcaster while in this model's Control range during your opponent's last turn as if it were one of its own spells. This model cannot upkeep spells that do not appear on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

arcana.name: Reckoning
arcana.description:
The warlock can play this card when an enemy model destroys or removes from play a friendly Faction warrior model in the warlock’s Control range.

Friendly Faction models gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against the attacking enemy model/unit. When the enemy model/unit is destroyed or removed from play, choose another enemy model/unit to be affected by Reckoning, Reckoning lasts for one round.

execution.name: Blessed Wards
execution.description: This model gains +3 ARM against damage rolls made by Infernal or undead models.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

ability.name: Guided
ability.description: Attacks made with this weapon automatically hit.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Gallows
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Rebuke
spells.description: Target model/unit cannot give orders, receive orders, or make power attacks or special attacks.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.description: Place the wall template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. When a model enters or ends it's activation in the wall template, it suffers an unboostble POW 12 fire damage roll and the Fire continuous effect. Models within and within 1" of the template gain concealment.

characterabilities.name: Kingdom of Silence
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when a Cohort model in this model's battlegroup is destroyed by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can cast a spell without spending fury.

characterabilities.name: Master of Ruin
characterabilities.description: Other model, friendly or enemy, suffer -2 ARM while within 5" of this model.

arcana.name: Taste of Ashes
arcana.description:
The warlock can play this card when a warbeast in its battlegroup is disabled by an enemy attack while in the warlock’s Control range.

When a warbeast in the warlock’s battlegroup is disabled by an enemy attack while in the warlock’s Control range, after the attack is resolved the attacker and the d3 enemy models nearest to it suffer d3 points of arcane damage. Taste of Ashes lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Ashes To Ashes
spells.description: If target model is hit, the d3 nearest enemy models within 4" of it suffer a POW 10 fire damage roll. These additional damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Ashes to Ashes damage rolls are simultaneous.

spells.name: Burning Ash
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffers -2 to attack rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Dust To Dust
spells.description: When an enemy warrior model is boxed by Dust to Dust, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on it, then remove the model from play. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Host of Shadows
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain Ghostly. Host of Shadows lasts for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes.).

spells.name: Sands of Fate
spells.description: Remove a friendly living Faction trooper model in the spellcaster's Control Range from play and replace it with the spellcaster. The spellcaster cannot advance this activation after being placed by Sands of Fate.

spells.name: Scything Touch
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains Dark Shroud. (While in the melee range of a model with Dark Shroud, enemy models suffer -2 ARM.).

characterabilities.name: Attuned Spirit [Friendly Faction]
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, this model can cast the animus of friendly faction warbeast in it's battlegroup without spending fury.

characterabilities.name: Crossroads
characterabilities.description: At the end of your turn, place three road markers anywhere completely within 6” of this model. At the start of your Maintenance Phase, you can place this model in the location of any of its road markers. The road markers are then removed whether or not this model was placed. If a model contacts a road marker, remove the road marker from the table.

characterabilities.name: Hidden Paths
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model contacts a road marker while advancing, after that model completes its movement one friendly Faction model currently in this model's Control range can advance up to 2”. A model can move only once per turn as a result of Hidden Paths.

arcana.name: Divergent Path
arcana.description:
The warlock can play this card when he is damaged by an enemy attack.

The warlock can transfer the damage from this attack without spending a fury point. After the attack is resolved, the warlock can be placed in the location of any of his road markers.

execution.name: Great Power
execution.description: During your Control Phase, this model can upkeep one spell without spending focus, fury or essence.

ability.name: Beacon
ability.description: Friendly Faction models can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model hit by a weapon with Beacon without being forced or spending focus. A friendly Faction model charging an enemy model hit by Beacon gains +2" movement. Beacon lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Flare
ability.description: Models hit by an attack with Flare lose Stealth and cannot gain Stealth and suffer -2 DEF for one round.

spells.name: Crusader's Call
spells.description: Friendly Faction models beginning a charge in the spell caster's Control Range gain +2" movement. Crusader's Call lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Fog of War
spells.description: Models gain concealment while in the spellcaster's Control Range.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Repudiate
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Repudiate immediately expires. When an upkeep spell expires as a result of Repudiate, the model maintaining the spell suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Star-Crossed
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, enemy models gain an additional die on accuracy rolls. Discard the highest die of each roll. Star-Crossed lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Machinery
characterabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following effects. Arcane Machinery effects last for one round.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Grymkin, Khador]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Grymkin, Khador armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Primordial Arcane Power
characterabilities.description: When this model is a warcaster, it gains focus per its ARC stat, and when a Warlock it, gains Fury per its ARC stat. When it is a Warcaster, it gains the Focus Manipulation and Power Field rules. When it is a Warlock, it gains the Fury Manipulation and Transferring Damage rules. When it is a Warcaster, this model includes warjacks in it's battlegroup. When it is a warlock, this model includes warbeasts in it's battlegroup. This model always has a feat, and does not use arcana cards.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

feat.name: Hour of Reckoning
feat.description: The Old Witch gains the benefit of all of her Arcane Machinery effects if able this activation.

execution.name: Underfoot
execution.description: This model gains Trample Power Attack.

topability.name: Arcane Machinery
topability.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following effects. Arcane Machinery effects last for one round.

subabilities.name: Arcane Calibrations
subabilities.description: Reduce the COST of each spells this model casts this activation by 1 to a minimum of 1.

subabilities.name: Divinator
subabilities.description:
While in this model's Control range, models in it's battlegroup can reroll failed 
accuracy rolls. Each roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Divinator.

subabilities.name: Hellhole
subabilities.description: Return to play d3 friendly destroyed Faction Grunts. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's command range, in formation, and within 3˝ of another model in its unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their Combat Actions the turn they are returned to play.

subabilities.name: Range Amplifier
subabilities.description: When this model casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG.

subabilities.name: Vexing Alignment
subabilities.description: Increase this model's Control range by 4”.

ability.name: Black Wings
ability.description: If this attack misses, nothing happens. On a direct hit against an enemy model, center a 4" AOE on the model hit. The AOE is a cloud effect and hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy living or undead models in the AOE when it is placed suffer Blind for one round. Enemy living or undead models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer 1 point of Arcane Damage. This model is not affected by Black Wings.

spells.name: Boundless Charge
spells.description: During it's activation, target friendly faction model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2 SPD and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Curse of Shadows
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM. A model can advance through an affected model if it has enough movement to move completely past its base.

spells.name: Reconstruct
spells.description: When target large-based or smaller warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup is disabled by an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, place it anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Remove 1 damage point from each system, then Reconstruction expires.

spells.name: Scourge
spells.description: Models hit by this attack become knocked down.

spells.name: Windstorm
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, enemy models' range weapons with a RNG greater than 8” suffer -5 RNG on affected ranged attacks to a minimum of 8”. When an enemy AOE ranged attack deviates from a point in this model's Control range, after determining the deviation distance, you choose the deviation direction. Additionally, while in the spellcaster's Control Range friendly models gain Blast Resistance.Windstorm lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Vortex [Corpse]
characterabilities.description: This model can immediately negate any spell that targets it or a model within 3" of it by spending 1 focus/fury/essence. The negated spell does not take effect, but its COST remains spent.

characterabilities.name: Bone Picker [3]
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token and the destroyed model is removed from play. This model can have up to 3 corpse tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: Grave Secrets
characterabilities.description: If this model is in its warlock's Control range during your Control Phase, the warlock can spend corpse tokens on this model to upkeep one spell for each token spent.

characterabilities.name: Rattle Bones
characterabilities.description: If this model has one or more corpse tokens and is in its battlegroup controller's Control range, the battlegroup controller can channel spells through it.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

animi.name: Wraithbane
animi.description: Target friendly Faction model's weapons gain Blessed and Damage Type: Magical. Wraithbane lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Time Stutter
characterabilities.description: Once per turn when one or more of this model's aspects are crippled by an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, immediately after the attack is resolved place this model anywhere completely within 3" of its current location.

ability.name: Slow
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon has its base DEF reduced to 5. Slow lasts for one round.

animi.name: Time Lock
animi.description: Enemy models activating within 6" of the spellcaster suffer -2 SPD that activation. Time Lock lasts one round.

characterabilities.name: Bounding Leap
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, after making a full advance as its Normal Movement but before performing its Combat Action, this model can spend 1 focus point or be forced to be placed completely within 5” of its current location.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

animi.name: Elusive
animi.description: The spellcaster gains Dodge. Elusive lasts for one round.(A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)

characterabilities.name: Regeneration [d3]
characterabilities.description: This model can be forced to remove d3 damage points once per activation. This model cannot use Regeneration during an activation it runs.

characterabilities.name: Snacking
characterabilities.description: When this model boxes a living model with a melee attack, it can choose to remove the boxed model from play. When it does, this model can remove d3 damage points.

animi.name: See in the Dark
animi.description: The spellcaster can ignore cloud effects when determining LOS. Additionally, the spellcaster can ignore Stealth. See in the Dark lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Extended Control Range
characterabilities.description: When checking to see if this model is in its controller's Control range, double the range.

characterabilities.name: Ghostly
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

ability.name: Catch
ability.description: If this weapon directly hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the model directly hit can be pushed directly towards this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction. After the model directly hit is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against it. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during its Combat Action.

animi.name: Lightning Strike
animi.description: The spellcaster gains Sprint. Lightning Strike lasts for one turn. (At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with a melee attack, a model with Sprint can immediately make a full advance, then its activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

characterabilities.name: Overtake
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".

animi.name: Menace
animi.description: Enemy warrior models suffer -1 Accuracy and STR while in this model command.

characterabilities.name: Bone Picker [3]
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys a living or undead enemy model with a melee attack, this model gains the destroyed model's corpse token and the destroyed model is removed from play. This model can have up to 3 corpse tokens at any time.

characterabilities.name: Death Feast
characterabilities.description: During it's activation, this model can spend corpse tokens to remove d3 damage points for each token spent.

characterabilities.name: Death-Powered
characterabilities.description: This model gains +1 STR and ARM for each corpse token currently on it.

animi.name: Lurker
animi.description: The spellcaster gains Pathfinder and Bushwhack. Lurker lasts for one turn. (During its activation, a model with Bushwhack can make its Combat Action before its Normal Movement. If it does, it must make a full advance as it's Normal Movement that activation.)

characterabilities.name: Cram Inside
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model is destroyed or removed from play within 2" of this model, this model can immediately remove d3 damage points. Additionally, during its activation this model can spend corpse tokens on friendly Faction models within 2" of it to remove d3 damage points for each token spent.

characterabilities.name: Escapees
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed by an enemy attack, collateral damage, or a continuous effect, you can replace it with a Gremlin Swarm solo. Then this model is removed from play.

ability.name: Drag
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the enemy model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction. After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

ability.name: Pull
ability.description: If this model hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base with a basic attack with this weapon, after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction.

ability.name: Pull
ability.description: If this model hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base with a basic attack with this weapon, after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction.

animi.name: Undergrowth
animi.description: While within 5" of the spellcaster, enemy models treat open terrain as rough terrain and suffer –2 DEF. Undergrowth lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Support
characterabilities.description: While this model is in its warcaster/warlock's Control range, the warcaster/warlock can upkeep one spell without spending focus/fury.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Jump
characterabilities.description: After it makes a full advance during its Normal Movement but before it performs its Combat Action, you can place this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location. Any effects that prevent charging also prevent this model from using Jump.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Parley (★Action)
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy warrior models cannot cannot target this model or its warcaster/warlock with attacks. Parlay lasts one round.

subabilities.name: Spell Slave (★Action) (★Attack)
subabilities.description: This model must be in it's warcaster's Control Range to make the Spell Slave special action. When it does, it casts one of the spells on it's warcaster's card with a COST of 3 or less. This model cannot cast upkeep spells or spells with a RNG of SELF or CTRL. When casting an offensive spell, Spell Slave in a magic attack. Use this model's Magic Ability score when making magic accuracy rolls.

subabilities.name: Swamp Gas (★Action)
subabilities.description: Center a 4˝ AOE cloud effect on this model. The AOE is a gas effect and remains centered on the model for one round. If this model is destroyed or removed from play, remove the AOE from play. While in the AOE, living enemy models suffer –2 to attack rolls.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: If this attack hits a small-based non-leader model, the model hit is removed from play.

ability.name: Drag
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base, immediately after the attack is resolved the enemy model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction. After the enemy model is moved, this model can make one basic melee attack against the enemy model. After resolving this melee attack, this model can make additional melee attacks during it's Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Alcohol-Fueled
characterabilities.description: This model cannot forfeit its Normal Movement. When this model makes its Normal Movement, instead of moving it normally you must choose its facing. It then advances its SPD +d6˝ in a straight line, stopping if it contacts another model or terrain.

characterabilities.name: Temperamental
characterabilities.description: This model explodes if it contacts another model while it is advancing, if it becomes knocked down, or is boxed. When this model explodes, center a 4˝ AOE on it. Other models in the AOE suffer an unboostable POW 14 fire damage roll and the Fire continuous effect, then this model is removed from play.

characterabilities.name: Battle Wizard
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one Magic ability special attack or special action.

characterabilities.name: Dark Power
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on arcane attack accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

characterabilities.name: Divine Manifestation
characterabilities.description: This model is not a living model, cannot become knocked down, and never suffers Blind or Shadow Bind. Opponents cannot take Control of this model.

characterabilities.name: Gate Walker
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, immediately after this model casts a spell, you can warp this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location.

characterabilities.name: Torrent of Blasphemy
characterabilities.description: While in this model's command range, enemy models lose Sacred Ward and do not produce soul tokens.

characterabilities.name: Twist the Eternal
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model in this model's command range gains a soul token. It immediately suffers the Fire continuous effect.

characterabilities.name: Unleash the Arcane
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, when this model hits an enemy with a Magic Ability Special attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one additional Magic Ability or special action.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Desecration (★Action)

characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Habitable Bottom Floor
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.
